snippet: The decision to decline or invest requires an analysis of the offer and the person making it, and an assessment of the pain of losing a friend if the investment turns sour.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column on what to do when friends pitch investment ideas; says decision to decline or invest requires analysis of offer and person making it, as well as assessment of pain of losing a friend if investment turns sour.
